m_title: Time zone and access from home network
m_descr: Configuration of time zone and definition of local access by Ethernet.
h_timezone: Select your time zone from the list. You will need to REBOOT your box after saving this data for time to change.
l_wan_port_access: Allow access from home network by Ethernet
h_wan_port_access: Access by Ethernet is turned off by factory default. If activated the security of your gateway depends on the security of your cable based home network.
